text: ivarkal pumiyil pirayanam ceytu tankalukku munnar iruntavarkalin mutivu eppatiyiruntatu enpataip parkka villaiya? Avarkal ivarkalai vita (ennikkaiyil) atikamakavum, palattilum, pumiyil vittuc cenra cinnankalilum mikaittavarkalakavum iruntarkal - eninum, avarkal campatittatu (etuvum) avarkalukkup payanalikkavillai
